function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Potential exposure to harmful chemical disinfectants and sanitizers","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Bio composite materials as an alternative to reduce indoor air pollutants","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Nbpi has been adopted in various types of buildings, but its effectiveness in controlling the transmission of contagious diseases like coronaviruses needs to be further studied.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disinfectant fogging systems may pose a health risk if not properly regulated and applied, leading to exposure of building occupants to harmful chemicals.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate research and regulation of air-purifying plants may lead to inconsistent efficacy and potential health risks from plant-related allergens or toxins.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Direct exposure to uv rays from germicidal sources can be harmful to human eyes and skin","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient disinfection of air and surfaces in indoor environments may lead to increased transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High maintenance costs of copper materials.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Combining plastics with antimicrobial substances like copper, silver, and zinc.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Survival of covid-19 virus on various materials may contribute to the spread of the virus.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate temperature and humidity control leading to virus persistence","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited understanding of virus deactivation requirements for hvac systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of contactless systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of safe physical distancing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Integration of ’contactless pathways’ to reduce covid-19 disease transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Application of green design and environmentally friendly approaches at bee’ah headquarters","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Modular construction for emergency hospitals may not have effective pathogen control measures in place, leading to increased transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of touchless technology and automation may lead to overreliance on these systems and neglect of manual cleaning and disinfection processes, resulting in higher transmission rates of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High reliance on contactless systems may lead to a false sense of security and neglect of other important infection control measures, contributing to increased transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased transmission of covid-19 due to inadequate ventilation and airflow in buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate construction techniques for emergency buildings , covid hospitals, quarantine tents","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conversion of existing buildings into emergency centers raises potential health and safety risks","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 virus in crowded places","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective building design for healthy environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 in buildings due to poor ventilation and crowded spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited focus on other research topics in healthy building technologies, with emphasis mainly on covid-19 and ventilation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Heavy reliance on buildings for livelihood activities during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation systems in buildings leading to poor air quality and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of sustainable and cost-effective building technologies for improving air quality and reducing disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Indoor air pollutants linked to mental conditions and negative feelings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of spatial layout consideration impacting indoor air quality","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Ineffective promotion of social interactions in building design","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor indoor air quality leading to health issues","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Suboptimal levels of ieq variables in buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in ensuring high ieq levels during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Indoor airborne transmission of covid-19 in crowded and poorly ventilated environments.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges to traditional design and construction approach to residential and public buildings.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Post covid-19 architecture and the concept of healthy buildings.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on ai for covid-19 detection and prediction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate exploration of ai utilities in healthcare","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential conflicts of interest in research and publication","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of inaccurate or biased ai-generated predictions leading to inappropriate resource allocation and ineffective health management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited coverage of literature databases may result in incomplete understanding of ai’s impact on health care in lmics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Over-reliance on ai predictions may lead to neglect of traditional public health practices and human judgment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Using ai algorithms to design new molecules or repurpose drugs may lead to unforeseen side effects or interactions with existing medications.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sharing vast amounts of treatment data globally using ai tools may raise concerns about data privacy and security.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on ai for diagnosis and treatment decision-making may lead to misinterpretation of medical data and incorrect clinical decisions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on ai-based prediction models for pandemic forecasting","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of ai for patient management and monitoring","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ai-facilitated drug discovery for covid-19 treatment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
